title: The Great Rock 'n' Roll Swindle
description:
The Great Rock 'n' Roll Swindle DVD

AKA: Who Killed Bambi? (UK) (working title)


Director:      Julien Temple

Writer:        Julien Temple (writer)

Release Date:  Canada   11 September 1980 (Toronto Film Festival) 
               France   25 November 1981  
               Sweden   1 April 1983  
               Finland  1988 (video premiere) 
               Japan    28 April 1990  
               USA      August 1990 (Los Angeles, California) 
  
Genre:         Comedy | Music | Musical | Mockumentary
Tagline:       The staggering story of the group who wrung the neck of rock 'n' roll
Plot:          A rather incoherent post-breakup Sex Pistols "documentary", told  
               from the point of view of Pistols manager Malcolm McLaren... 

Plot Keywords: Pirates | Music Business | Mockumentary | Satire | Part Animation 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Cast:

 Malcolm McLaren ...         The Embezzler 
 Steve Jones ...             The Crook 
 Paul Cook ...               The Tea-Maker 
 Sid Vicious ...             The Gimmick 
 John Lydon ...              The Collaborator (as Johnny Rotten) 
 Ronald Biggs ...            The Exile (as Ronnie Biggs) 
 Liz Fraser ...              Woman in Cinema 
 Jess Conrad ...             Jess 
 Mary Millington ...         Mary, The Crook's girlfriend 
 James Aubrey ...            Record Executive 

 Julian Holloway ...         Man 
 John Shannon ...            Nazi 
 Helen Wellington-Lloyd ...  Helen (as Helen of Troy) 
 Edward Tudor-Pole ...       Tadpole (kiosk attendant) (as Tenpole Tudor) 
 Faye Hart ...               Secretary 

 Use: DAEMON Tools
